name: solchain-webapp
description: SolChain - Blockchain Based P2P Solar Energy Trading Platform - BCOLBD 2025

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../smart-contracts && npm install && cd ../ai-services && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run blockchain" "npm run deploy:wait" "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run ai"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run blockchain" "npm run deploy:wait" "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run ai"
scripts.deploy: cd smart-contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.backend: cd backend && npm run init-db && npm run dev
scripts.test:all: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.build:all: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules smart-contracts/node_modules backend/database ai-services/database
scripts.lint:all: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.format:all: cd frontend && npm run format && cd ../backend && npm run format

author: Team GreyDevs
